TraitDef.label: Saxhleel Adaptation
TraitDef.description: This Saxhleel possesses the quintessential Argonian adaptations - superior disease resistance, natural healing, and deep connection to the Hist.

li.label: Hist-Blessed
li.description: Born with the traditional blessings of the Hist trees, this pawn has enhanced resistance to disease, natural healing abilities, and superior swamp adaptation.

TraitDef.label: Naga Serpentine
TraitDef.description: This Naga possesses the serpentine strength and swimming abilities of the larger Argonian subspecies.

li.label: Serpent Strength
li.description: Born with powerful serpentine features, this pawn has enhanced physical strength and swimming abilities but reduced agility on land.

TraitDef.label: Sarpa Intellect
TraitDef.description: This Sarpa possesses the enhanced intellectual capabilities and social grace of the more humanoid Argonian subspecies.

li.label: Diplomatic Mind
li.description: Born with humanoid proportions and enhanced intellect, this pawn excels in social situations, research, and diplomatic relations.

TraitDef.label: Agaceph Camouflage
TraitDef.description: This Agaceph possesses the natural camouflage abilities and stealth mastery of the chameleon-like Argonian subspecies.

li.label: Chameleon Skin
li.description: Born with color-changing abilities and natural stealth, this pawn excels in ambush tactics and stealth operations.

TraitDef.label: Paatru Endurance
TraitDef.description: This Paatru possesses the incredible endurance and toxin resistance of the toad-like Argonian subspecies.

li.label: Marsh Toughness
li.description: Born with exceptional constitution and endurance, this pawn excels in physical labor and has incredible resistance to toxins and environmental hazards.

TraitDef.label: Wamasu Draconic
TraitDef.description: This Wamasu possesses the rare draconic heritage and mystical abilities of the most blessed Argonian subspecies.

li.label: Dragon-Touched
li.description: Born with draconic features and ancient magical heritage, this pawn has enhanced magical abilities and natural leadership qualities.
